sense.def:
To filter a substance
pomeni spustiti neko snov skozi napravo, namenjeno temu, da iz snovi odstrani trdne delce.

seg.quote: Water would have to be filtered many times to remove any radioactive matter.

sense.def:
A filter
je naprava, skozi katero nekaj prečistimo.

Kadar svetloba ali zvok
filters into a place
, komaj prihaja na tisti kraj.

seg.quote: ...with the morning light already filtering through the curtains.

sense.def:
Kadar novica ali podatek
filters through to people
, postopoma pride do ljudi.

seg.quote: Disturbing rumours filtered back from the East.

sense.def:
To filter out something from a substance
pomeni tisto odstraniti iz snovi, tako da jo spustimo skozi filter.

seg.quote: First we would have to filter out some of the tar particles.
